Health data is personal data and is considered sensitive. It is subject to special protection under the law (European regulation on the protection of personal data - RGPD, Loi Informatique et Libertés, Code de la santé publique, etc.) in order to guarantee respect for the privacy of individuals.

question.title: Health data is considered
question.description: What type of data is subject to special protection under the law?

option_a.title: Public data
option_a.description: Data that is freely accessible to anyone

option_b.title: Confidential data
option_b.description: Data that is only accessible to authorized personnel

option_c.title: Personal data
option_c.description: Data that is subject to special protection under the law

option_d.title: Protected health information
option_d.description: Data that is protected from unauthorized disclosure
